text: Wateenyan teuma geujok ngon kitab Kaphe nyang sisat muka pih ubah â€˜Oh ban jikalon sinan meusurat Jimarit ligat meunyeusai leupah Ceulaka tanyoe wahe dum sahbat Haba lam kitab abeh geupeuhah Dum buet nyang jeuheut sinan meusurat Bah le ubit that hana geukeubah Ubit ngon raya dacha geusurat Bandum lam kitab sinan geupeugah Peue nyang jipubuet yoh masa hayat Bandum jilihat dalam keureutah Hana elanya meu sidroe meuhat Tuhan Hadharat ade sileupah
